designs.name: Luxury Spa Bathroom
designs.description: Relaxing spa-inspired bathroom with premium finishes and calm ambiance
designs.walls: Large format marble tiles with subtle veining
designs.ceiling: Moisture-resistant false ceiling with cove lighting
designs.lighting: Warm LED mirror lights, recessed spotlights
designs.fixtures: Floating vanity, wall-mounted WC, glass shower enclosure
designs.decor: Indoor plants, candles, stone trays, plush towels
designs.prompt_keywords: luxury spa bathroom, marble bathroom, relaxing modern toilet

designs.name: Modern Minimal Bathroom
designs.description: Clean, clutter-free bathroom with sharp modern aesthetics
designs.fixtures: Wall-hung WC, sleek vanity, concealed storage
designs.prompt_keywords: modern minimal bathroom, clean toilet design, simple interiors

designs.name: Hotel Style Bathroom
designs.description: Elegant hotel-inspired bathroom offering premium guest comfort
designs.ceiling: False ceiling with warm ambient lights
designs.fixtures: Countertop basin, vanity unit, wall-mounted WC
designs.decor: Rolled towels, tray accessories, framed mirror
designs.prompt_keywords: hotel style bathroom, luxury toilet interiors, elegant design

designs.name: Industrial Modern Bathroom
designs.description: Bold industrial bathroom with raw textures and urban appeal
designs.walls: Grey textured tiles with black accents
designs.fixtures: Black metal fixtures, floating concrete vanity
designs.prompt_keywords: industrial bathroom, concrete toilet design, urban modern

designs.description: Earthy bathroom inspired by natural materials and calm tones

designs.prompt_keywords: nature bathroom, organic toilet design, earthy interiors

designs.name: Monochrome Chic Bathroom

designs.prompt_keywords: coastal bathroom, beach style toilet, fresh light interiors
